analysis.description:
DigiPulse.withdrawFundsToOwner (/unique_chucks/5/0x9aca6abfe63a5ae0dc6258cefb65207ec990aa4d.sol#160-162) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x9aca6abfe63a5ae0dc6258cefb65207ec990aa4d.sol#162)

DigiPulse (/unique_chucks/5/0x9aca6abfe63a5ae0dc6258cefb65207ec990aa4d.sol#3-176) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/5/0x9aca6abfe63a5ae0dc6258cefb65207ec990aa4d.sol#36-46)
dgtWithBonus in DigiPulse.fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0x9aca6abfe63a5ae0dc6258cefb65207ec990aa4d.sol#65) is a local variable never initialiazed

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0x9aca6abfe63a5ae0dc6258cefb65207ec990aa4d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.4 (/unique_chucks/5/0x9aca6abfe63a5ae0dc6258cefb65207ec990aa4d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_to' of DigiPulse.transfer (/unique_chucks/5/0x9aca6abfe63a5ae0dc6258cefb65207ec990aa4d.sol#37) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of DigiPulse.transfer (/unique_chucks/5/0x9aca6abfe63a5ae0dc6258cefb65207ec990aa4d.sol#37) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of DigiPulse.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/5/0x9aca6abfe63a5ae0dc6258cefb65207ec990aa4d.sol#142) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of DigiPulse.withdrawFundsToOwner (/unique_chucks/5/0x9aca6abfe63a5ae0dc6258cefb65207ec990aa4d.sol#161) is not in mixedCase
